title: Movable Property (Security Interest) (Fees) Regulations, 2016
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 865
Gazette dated Friday, 28th October, 2016
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.73 OF2016
The Movable Property Act, 2016
(ActNo.3of 2016)
The Movable Property (Security Interest) (Fees)
Regulations, 2016
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in sections 32 and 100 of
theMovableProperty(SecurityInterest)Act,2016,thefollowing
Regulationsaremade:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Movable Property Title
(SecurityInterest)(Fees)Regulations,2016.
2. The fees specified in the Schedule are theapplicable fees Fees
forthemattersspecifiedinthatSchedule.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
866 Statutory Instruments 28thOctober,2016
SCHEDULE
(Regulation2)
PRESCRIBEDFEES
No. Item FeeUnit
1. Registrationoffinancingstatement 334
2. Noticeofamendmentoffinancingstatement 334
3. Dischargeofafinancingstatement 334
4. Search 67
5. Certificateofstatus 67
6. Registrationofenforcementnoticeofcreditorâ€™srights 167
7. Registrationofextinguishmentofsecurityinterest 167
M. D. MWANAKATWE,
LUSAKA Minister of Commerce,
25thOctober,2016 Trade and Industry
